FuncDef: This command is used to map the forwarding class to the specifiedqueue-id. The specifiedqueue-idmust exist within the egress queue group template. When a queue is defined in a forwarding class mapping, that queue cannot be deleted unless the forwarding class mapping is moved to another queue within the template. Other criteria may also exist preventing the queue from being deleted from the template such as an applied SAP egress QoS policy mapping to the queue.

ParaDef.Info: The specified queue-id must exist within the egress queue group template. Values-1 to 8.
